ObjectDetectionYolo.Name: Object Detection (YOLOv5 6.2)
ObjectDetectionYolo.Description: Provides Object Detection using YOLOv5 v6.2 library with support for CPUs and CUDA enabled GPUs.

RouteMaps.Name: Object Detector (YOLOv5 6.2)
RouteMaps.Description: Detects multiple objects, of 80 different possible types, in an image.

Inputs.Name: image
Inputs.Description: The HTTP file object (image) to be analyzed.

Inputs.Name: min_confidence
Inputs.Description: The minimum confidence level for an object will be detected. In the range 0.0 to 1.0. Default 0.4.

Outputs.Name: predictions
Outputs.Description: An array of objects with the x_max, x_min, max, y_min, label and confidence.

Outputs.Name: inferenceMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to perform the AI inference.

Outputs.Name: processMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to process the image (includes inference and image manipulation operations).

Outputs.Name: analysisRoundTripMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) for the round trip to the analysis module and back.

RouteMaps.Name: Custom Object Detector (YOLOv5 6.2)
RouteMaps.Description: Detects objects based on YOLO PyTorch models. Models are stored as .pt files in the /ObjectDetectionYolo/assets directory, and to make a call to a specific model use /vision/custom/model-name, where 'model-name' is the name of the model's .pt file

Inputs.Name: image
Inputs.Description: The HTTP file object (image) to be analyzed.

Inputs.Name: min_confidence
Inputs.Description: The minimum confidence level for an object will be detected. In the range 0.0 to 1.0. Default 0.4.

Outputs.Name: predictions
Outputs.Description: An array of objects with the x_max, x_min, max, y_min, label and confidence.

Outputs.Name: inferenceMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to perform the AI inference.

Outputs.Name: processMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to process the image (includes inference and image manipulation operations).

Outputs.Name: analysisRoundTripMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) for the round trip to the analysis module and back.

RouteMaps.Name: Object Detector List Custom Models (YOLOv5 6.2)
RouteMaps.Description: Returns a list of models available.

Outputs.Name: models
Outputs.Description: An array of strings containing the names of the models installed.
